edu.ucla.sspace.tools

Class WikipediaCleaner

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.tools.WikipediaCleaner

  • public class WikipediaCleaner
extends Object
    A tool for converting Wikipedia Snapshots into a parsable corpus of documents.
    Author:
    David Jurgens, Keith Stevens
